Articles.Content:
okay, so I was playing the ksp demo because I'm poor, and I got sick and tired of just 25 parts.

so I put two mods I downloaded into the plugins folder for the demo, but...

I know the demo is designed to only work with the parts it has, but the flags from the mods showed up.

why is that? If the flags went in, why not the parts? Someone please answer my question. .-.

I never played the demo, so i probably am wrong - but maybe flags are not considered 'parts' per se. More like decals, and thus are not subiect to downsizing. Also, maybe you should put the mods into 'Gamedata' folder?
and thanks for the suggestion, i put it in gamedata
If you're poor, describe your deep and abiding love of space and post a donate link.
